document.full_text: a high-tech u.s. research agency will get $130 million for programs that could one day decrease the cost of solar power and lessen dependence on rare earth metals used for alternative energy, the u.s. energy secretary said.
document.title: u.s. hi-tech energy unit extends life in budget deal
lines_and_colors: a high-tech u.s. research agency will get $130 million for programs that could one day decrease the cost of solar power and lessen dependence on rare earth metals used for alternative energy, the u.s. energy secretary said.
